body_html: I suppose stacking keras.layers.SimpleRNN with tf.layers.batch_normalization instead of keras.layers.BatchNormalization is probably not an intended use case, but if it's not allowed, the error message should be clear and consistent.
body_text: I suppose stacking keras.layers.SimpleRNN with tf.layers.batch_normalization instead of keras.layers.BatchNormalization is probably not an intended use case, but if it's not allowed, the error message should be clear and consistent.
body: I suppose stacking `keras.layers.SimpleRNN` with `tf.layers.batch_normalization` instead of `keras.layers.BatchNormalization` is probably not an intended use case, but if it's not allowed, the error message should be clear and consistent.
